title: 前美國駐聯合國大使黑利：香港人是自由鬥士 我們聽見你們的聲音和我們與你們站在一起！

replies.msg:
全球的目光都看見香港人不是恐怖份子。他們是自由鬥士。致香港人，我們祈求你們的安全及相信民主是值得為其爭取的。我們聽見你們的聲音和我們與你們站在一起！
#給香港自由

The eyes of the world see that the people of Hong Kong are not terrorists. They are freedom fighters. To the people of Hong Kong, we are praying for your safety and believe that democracy is worth fighting for. We hear you and we stand with you! 🇺🇸
#FreedomForHongKong

https://mobile.twitter.com/NikkiHaley/status/1161706111046754313

當香港人正爭取他們的自由，中國的威脅正全面展現。中國不但想控制她們的人民，而是全世界。
#為自由奮鬥

The threats of China are on full display as the people of Hong Kong are fighting for their freedoms. This is the level of control China wants to have not only over its people but around the world. #FightingForFreedom

https://mobile.twitter.com/NikkiHaley/status/1161300266248998912
